summary: This document is an email from Jeffrey Epstein to Jes Staley, requesting a phone call at home. The email emphasizes the confidentiality of the communication and includes a disclaimer regarding attorney-client privilege. It also contains a copyright notice and a request for confidential treatment by JPMorgan Chase.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Jeffrey Epstein is the sender of the email, reaching out to Jes Staley for a phone call.

persons.name: Jes Staley
persons.context: Jes Staley is the recipient of the email from Jeffrey Epstein, indicating a communication between the two.

keyFacts: Jeffrey Epstein requests Jes Staley to call him at home.
The email contains a confidentiality disclaimer and mentions attorney-client privilege.
There is a copyright notice included in the email.
The document requests confidential treatment by JPMorgan Chase.
